editorialSummary.text: High-end hotel featuring a cafe, a spa & a rooftop infinity pool, plus 4 restaurants & free Wi-Fi.

text.text: My partner and I thoroughly enjoyed our romantic weekend escape at this charming establishment. From the moment we arrived, we were struck by the elegant decor and the warm, welcoming atmosphere. Our room was beautifully appointed, with thoughtful touches like fresh flowers and a plush bathrobe. The bed was incredibly comfortable, ensuring a restful night's sleep. We loved spending time in the cozy lounge area, and the small, intimate restaurant served delicious food with impeccable service. The staff went above and beyond to make us feel special, offering excellent recommendations for local attractions. While it might not have all the bells and whistles of a large resort, its intimate scale and personalized service truly set it apart. Highly recommended for couples seeking a tranquil and romantic experience.

text.text:
Imagine walking into a palace that embodies the essence of Indian royalty, with its intricate architecture, lush gardens, and serene ambiance. The Leela Palace in Delhi is a haven of luxury, where every detail is meticulously crafted to provide an unforgettable experience.
As you step into the hotel, you're greeted by the warm glow of golden lighting and the soft strains of traditional Indian music. The lavish decor, inspired by the rich heritage of Indian palaces, transports you to a bygone era of grandeur and opulence.

The hotel's spacious rooms and suites are designed to provide the ultimate comfort, with plush furnishings, marble bathrooms, and stunning views of the surrounding gardens. The Leela Palace is also renowned for its exceptional dining experiences, with a range of restaurants serving exquisite Indian, international, and fusion cuisine.

Whether you're looking to relax in style, indulge in fine dining, or explore the city's attractions, The Leela Palace in Delhi is the perfect retreat for those seeking a luxurious and memorable experience.

text.text:
Absolute gem of a hotel. We stayed there for 1.5 weeks and loved it. The staff are all so so so friendly and kind. They remember you and your preferences, to be honest it felt like home.

The rooms were elegant and so clean. They were kept up in good condition and everything felt pristine, unlike other high end hotels in major Indian cities.

We had club floor and that was so worth it. Nice place to hang out, meet friends, or work from.

Their airport service was amazing — drivers, cars, airport support staff.

There are too many names to write down of all the staff that made our stay special.

I’ll for sure be back. This will be my go to delhi accommodations.

text.text:
I recently stayed at Leela palace and had an overall pleasant experience. The rooms were spacious, well-maintained, and offered a perfect balance of comfort and elegance. The staff was courteous, attentive, and quick to respond to any requests, making the service one of the highlights of the stay.

However, there were a couple of areas that could use some improvement. The swimming pool, though beautifully designed, was not as clean as expected from a hotel of this caliber. A bit more attention to maintenance here would go a long way. Additionally, while breakfast had a decent spread, it lacked the quality and variety usually associated with five-star hospitality.

All in all, a very comfortable stay with great service — just a few refinements needed to truly match the five-star standard across the board.

text.text:
I had the pleasure of staying at this hotel recently, and I must say, the food was absolutely outstanding. From breakfast to dinner, every meal was thoughtfully prepared, beautifully presented, and bursting with flavor.
The breakfast buffet offered a wide variety of options—from fresh fruits and pastries to made-to-order eggs and local specialties. It was the perfect way to start the day. Lunch and dinner were equally impressive, with a well-curated menu that catered to different tastes. The ingredients were fresh, the portions generous, and the service impeccable.
What truly stood out was the attention to detail and the warm hospitality of the staff. They were knowledgeable about the menu and happy to make recommendations or accommodate special requests.

text.text:
I recently stayed at Taj Palace, New Delhi, and it was an unforgettable experience. The property is luxurious, beautifully maintained, and offers world-class hospitality. The rooms are spacious, elegant, and equipped with every modern comfort.

The highlight of my stay was the exceptional service – the staff were warm, attentive, and went out of their way to ensure every need was taken care of. The restaurants offered a wide variety of cuisines, and the food quality was outstanding.

The location is excellent, close to key landmarks yet peaceful and serene. The pool, gardens, and wellness facilities added to the charm, making it both a relaxing and convenient stay.

Highly recommended for both business and leisure travelers who want a true 5-star experience in Delhi.

text.text:
My stay at Taj Palace, New Delhi was simply exceptional. From the moment I arrived, the staff made me feel truly welcomed with their warmth and professionalism. The property itself is stunning — elegant interiors, beautiful gardens, and a calm atmosphere that makes you forget you’re in the heart of Delhi.
The rooms were spacious, spotless, and thoughtfully designed with every modern comfort. Dining was a highlight — each restaurant offered authentic flavors, world-class service, and unforgettable meals. The breakfast spread was especially impressive with its variety and freshness.

What stood out most was the hospitality — every interaction with the staff reflected genuine care and attention to detail. Whether it was room service, housekeeping, or concierge, everything was handled flawlessly.

Overall, Taj Palace is not just a hotel but an experience in luxury and warmth. I would highly recommend it to anyone visiting Delhi, whether for business or leisure. 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

text.text:
Extremely Disappointing Stay – Not Recommended for Special Occasions or Even a Regular Visit
I stayed at this hotel for 2 days to celebrate a birthday, and unfortunately, it turned out to be one of the worst experiences I’ve had.
Breakfast service was chaotic and extremely delayed. Despite being advertised as complimentary, it felt more like an afterthought. Once seated, we had to follow up 4–5 times just to get basic service — completely unacceptable.
The staff pretends to be polite, but it's clear they are unwilling to put in any genuine effort. Any small request feels like a burden to them.
At the time of booking, we were promised several amenities and services — but once the booking was confirmed, none of those promises were fulfilled. To make things worse, they offer no cancellation or refund policy, which feels like a trap for unsuspecting guests.
Most of the positive reviews seem paid or heavily biased — the reality is far from what’s shown or promised online.
As an influencer who regularly shares honest travel and stay experiences, I can confidently say this property is not worth your time, money, or trust. Absolutely not recommended for birthdays, special occasions, or even a casual stay.

editorialSummary.text: Upscale hotel with posh rooms & suites, as well as 5 restaurants, 2 bars, an outdoor pool & a spa.

text.text: The check-in process was not a great start. Even though they send multiple emails asking if you need anything prior to check-in, it appears they don’t actually look at your response. Neeraj in the Summit Lounge made-up for the concierge’s mistakes, though. Normally traveling with children in high-end resorts can make you feel isolated, but he made us feel so welcome by bringing course after course of warm food for the kids and refreshing (amazing) drinks for the adults. He was the star of the show! The pool was a favorite for our whole group, although it is shut down in the rain. The food options pleased all. The limited seating in the pavilion was not ideal, and the wait staff there could use more training. The showstopper was the rooms - I was amazed by the intricate details in design and the comforting amenities that make you feel at home. The beds do seem bigger than they appear in the pictures, too.

I had a truly wonderful experience at ITC Delhi, and a major part of that was thanks to the incredibly warm and attentive staff.

A special shoutout to Shalu, the Front Office Manager, who went above and beyond to ensure my comfort. I was running late due to unexpected traffic, and she graciously extended my stay time without any hassle, making sure I didn’t feel rushed. Her calm demeanor, professionalism, and genuine care were truly appreciated.

The entire team at ITC was equally courteous, warm, and welcoming — from the front desk to housekeeping to the restaurant staff. There’s a certain sense of warmth and hospitality that makes you feel like more than just a guest.

Thank you ITC Delhi for such a lovely and seamless experience. I’m definitely coming back! 🌟

text.text: Living away from home, I wanted to surprise my parents for their anniversary, and ITC Maurya helped make it possible. Over the phone, Pam from Guest Relations coordinated everything — from arranging a cake and flowers to adding small personal touches that made the celebration feel special. She made sure the surprise went smoothly and that my parents enjoyed the moment. Even from a distance, it felt like I was part of their day, and I really appreciate the effort that went into making it happen.

text.text:
My Honest Review
During my recent stay at the hotel, one of the standout aspects that truly elevated the entire experience was the exceptional hospitality and professionalism of the hotel staff. From the moment I arrived, I was greeted with warm smiles and a genuine sense of welcome that instantly made me feel at home.
The front desk team was incredibly efficient and courteous, ensuring a smooth check-in process and readily answering all my questions with patience and clarity. They went above and beyond to accommodate my requests, whether it was about room preferences, local recommendations, or general inquiries.
The housekeeping staff deserves special appreciation as well. The room was consistently cleaned and maintained to a high standard. Every detail, from fresh linens to replenished amenities, was taken care of with care and consistency. Their quiet, respectful service added to the comfort of the stay.
I was also impressed by the restaurant and room service team, who were prompt, friendly, and attentive. They remembered preferences, offered helpful suggestions, and delivered everything with a smile. It's the kind of thoughtful service that truly enhances the overall guest experience.
What stood out the most was the genuine warmth and eagerness to help displayed by everyone — not just out of obligation, but seemingly because they truly cared about the guests' comfort and satisfaction. It’s rare to find such consistently positive and professional service across the board.
Overall, the staff played a major role in making my stay memorable. Their friendliness, attention to detail, and commitment to guest satisfaction were exemplary. I would gladly return to this hotel and recommend it to others based largely on the outstanding service provided by the team.

text.text:
Taj Mahal Hotel , New Delhi
Dates of Stay: August 10-11 2025
Room Type: Standard Double Room
My stay at Taj Mahal Hotel was disappointing. Despite its central location, the hotel failed to deliver on cleanliness and service.

Issues:-
Cleanliness:- The room had dust and stains on the furniture.
Service:- The front desk staff seemed unhelpful and slow to respond.
Noise:- The room was noisy due to the nearby highway.
Suggestions for Improvement:-

Improve room cleaning protocols and staff training.
Enhance soundproofing in rooms.

Rating:- 1/5🤡

text.text:
Great hotel! Close to so many places that are historic or touristy, as well as shopping and the embassies.
The entrance is wonderful,  ring greeted by a cadre of doormen ensuring that once you arrive, you no longer need to worry. They take your bags and whisk them away to your room, arriving shortly after your check-in is completed.
Like many upscale hotels, there is a car service for taking you on local trips (for a fee). Inside the hotel are several restaurants to choose from and I highly recommend them all.
The room was cozy but spacious. The room attendants were meticulous and returned in the evening to turn down the bed and check the room for any thing that might do quickly to straighten things up before you go to bed.
The spa left me in complete bliss after 90 minutes of massage and the pool was simply relaxing.

text.text:
Wonderful stay with excellent staff.

We really enjoyed our time here. The staff were outstanding. So friendly, attentive, and genuinely helpful. On our first evening, we were warned by hotel staff about common scammers outside the hotel. This was invaluable, as we were approached by someone pretending to be from the hotel, telling us Connaught Place was closed and offering to “show us the way.” Thanks to the staff’s advice, we didn’t fall for it. That thoughtfulness set the tone for our stay.

Special mention to the young lady and gentleman in the Grappa Bar, who were especially welcoming and the cleaner at the entrance who always smiled and said hi and would dry the seating near the smoking area so we could sit.

The hotel itself is very well maintained and extremely clean, even if some areas of the rooms felt a little dated in their decor. The gym and sauna were a highlight – spotless, peaceful, hi-tech, modern and again with excellent staff support.

If I could suggest one improvement, it would be the in-room coffee. As someone who needs a proper coffee before starting the day, I would have loved to see a coffee machine or at least higher-quality coffee bags rather than instant sachets. For a luxury property, this small detail would really make a difference.

Overall, a fantastic experience. I’d definitely recommend this hotel and would be happy to stay again on my next trip to Delhi.

In one of the rooms the thermostat would not increase beyond 21 degrees, and did not get fixed despite us asking them twice. The showers were also not very hot. The breakfast is very nice with a wide selection and a nice ambience. The food is a hit or miss in room service, the same pasta dish ordered one night was very good, and almost inedible the next day. 75% of the staff had a scowl on their faces which was very unwarranted, and made it not a place to which I would eagerly return to.

Absolutely loved our stay!

From the moment we entered the property, everything felt top-notch. The staff was super polite, professional, and always ready to help with a smile. The ambiance of the hotel is luxurious yet welcoming. Our room was spacious, spotless, and had a beautiful city view.

We also appreciated the little thoughtful touches : quick check-in, smooth service, and free parking. The location is also excellent for getting around Delhi.

Highly recommend Andaz Delhi if you're looking for a clean, stylish, and comfortable 5-star experience. Worth every penny!

editorialSummary.text: Luxurious property set in 2 towers offering swanky rooms, plus a ballroom, 3 restaurants & 2 pools.

text.text: Excellent service and kind staff. They operate efficiently and know what they are doing. The breakfast was plentiful and tasty.  Clean throughout the hotel. The restaurant made delicious dinners. Yes, compared to places outside the hotel, the prices are high but the quality of the food and the comfort of the environment make the price worth it. The rooms are quiet and generally cleaned. My room happened to have one pillow and duvet cover with just a few small marks. Everything else was great. The location for us was OK as we were looking for 5-star hotels near the international fair grounds and this was the best choice (30min Uber ride from the trade fair). I recommend this hotel! Well done, Leela Ambience!

text.text:
I recently stayed at The Leela Ambience Convention Centre, Delhi, and overall had a good experience. The service was excellent—special mention to Srishti from the guest relations team who was extremely helpful and made sure I had a smooth early check-in and late check-out. It was my birthday, and the complimentary cake was a sweet gesture that really stood out.

The room was spacious and comfortable, but there was a noticeable damp smell on the floor, and the shower needed some repairs—something that could be improved given the 5-star tag.

I tried in-room dining and also had the buffet breakfast. While the service was prompt, the food didn’t quite live up to expectations. I’d rate it 4/10 in terms of taste and quality. For the price point, I was expecting more refined and flavorful options.

Overall, I’d rate my stay 8/10. Great service and hospitality, but there’s definitely scope to improve food quality and room upkeep to truly match the luxury standard.

text.text:
My stay at The Leela Hotel was absolutely lovely and seamless from start to finish. From the moment I arrived, the service was impeccable—every detail was taken care of with such attention. The staff was welcoming and professional, always ensuring that I was comfortable and had everything I needed.

The room was spacious, beautifully designed, and had all the modern amenities I could ask for, with a touch of luxury that made it feel extra special. The view was stunning, and the bed was incredibly comfortable, ensuring a restful night after a busy day.

One of the highlights of my stay was the swimming pool. It was the perfect place to unwind and relax. The pool was pristine, surrounded by lush greenery, offering a peaceful retreat from the hustle and bustle. The setting was just beautiful, and I enjoyed spending time there, whether I was swimming laps or simply lounging by the water.

Dining at The Leela was also a treat. The variety of food options was fantastic, and the quality was top-notch. Every meal felt like a delightful experience, and the ambiance of the restaurants was perfect for both casual and fine dining.

Overall, my stay was a smooth and relaxing experience, and I left feeling completely rejuvenated. I highly recommend The Leela for anyone seeking a refined, stress-free getaway, complete with amazing amenities like their beautiful pool!

I highly recommend Café Knosh for its exceptional cuisine and outstanding service. It undoubtedly stands out as a memorable highlight of my stay.

The chef even came around to ask if we enjoyed our meal, which made us feel truly pampered. I highly recommend this hotel for an exceptional experience!

text.text:
Appalling and Shameful service from Staff I stayed at The Lalit Hotel in New Delhi for four days it was my first time visiting the city. The hotel itself is beautiful, with a great location. It’s clean, the rooms are lovely, and from a physical and design standpoint, it meets the standard of what you’d expect from a luxury property.

But sadly, my experience was affected by the service, particularly from the restaurant staff. I want to be fair hotel staff around the world are usually warm, professional, and kind. But during my stay, I couldn’t ignore how I was treated, especially compared to other guests. Being a person of color, I felt I was treated differently, and that feeling was hard to shake. I don’t know if it’s a cultural issue or something else, but it was clear that white guests were given noticeably better service.

One example: I was seated at breakfast at a table that still had dirty glasses and utensils from a previous guest. No one came to clean it or offer fresh cutlery. Meanwhile, a white guest seated right before me was shown to a fully set, clean table without delay. That kind of disparity is hard to overlook, especially in a hotel that calls itself five-star.

Experiencing this type of treatment made me feel uncomfortable and, frankly, discriminated against. It’s disappointing, because this hotel has so much potential but service like that falls far below the standard that should come with the rating and price tag.

If The Lalit wants to be a truly world-class hotel, it needs to ensure all guests are treated with equal respect and dignity regardless of skin color or nationality.

It prides itself in being LGBT Friendly, I am part of that community, Not because you employ LGBT individuals means you are respectful and professional. Its a shame BUT I WILL NEVER STAY AT THIS HOTEL AGAIN OR never RECOMMEND ANYONE too

text.text:
Worst 5 star Hotel I have ever stayed at.

I stayed over for 3 nights. Checked in to my room. As soon as I entered, it felt claustrophobic with no Window. just a small piece of glass cut out in a corner with the most horrible view ever.
I went to reception to ask for a different room. Unfortunately, not very helpful, and started to question me that he cant believe that I dont like the room. Then my only option was to get an Exec room, which was an upgrade that I got by paying 5K per night extra.
Now second part: I am laying in my bed. and I heard someone open my door at 10:45pm. Apparently they double booked the room I was in. I see an older gentleman walking in, as he got assigned the same room. He was so embarassed. We both went down to reception. Again just a Low valued apology was given, while looking at a computer screen. Nobody cared of what had just happened. No compensation was provided.
Third: The Hygiene: Well I have attached pictures of cockroach infestation. So bad customer service, and low quality room was not enough. I was greeted with Cockroaches in the dim lighted bathroom.

Again, MOST HORRIBLE PLACE TO STAY AT. there is noting 5-star about it. Take your business somewhere else.

This place is a gem in the heart of New Delhi. Opulence, artistry, royalty with world class service and variety of cuisine.

We stayed in the Grand Room Heritage. Very big room with room to relax and unwind.

Something they need to change and cater for their audience. But Bharat made special curry for us without chilies.

Gym, pool are great. Spa experience is magical.

A must visit.

text.text:
Stepping into The Imperial New Delhi is like walking into a beautifully preserved chapter of history. Established in 1936, this iconic hotel exudes old-world charm and colonial grandeur. The architecture, vintage photographs, and the elegant 1911 Restaurant take you straight back to the era of the British Raj. Every corner whispers of the past, yet the service and comfort are world-class and timeless.

If you're seeking a stay that combines luxury with a rich sense of heritage, The Imperial is unmatched. The royal ambiance, attentive staff, and stunning interiors make it more than just a hotel  it’s an experience. Truly one of the finest reminders of the bygone imperial era in Delhi

text.text: I spent a few elegant hours at The Imperial during a ring ceremony and was truly impressed by its timeless glamour and graceful revival. The recent refurbishment has artfully updated the hotel—new technology, refreshed terraces without compromising its rich colonial heritage and grandeur. From its iconic Art Deco façade and art-filled corridors to the impeccably restored interiors, everything exudes old-world luxury with modern finesse. Even in that brief visit, the ambiance felt rich and welcoming.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Hyatt Regency Hotel, and my experience was nothing short of exceptional. The hotel’s location is ideal – right in the heart of the city, making it incredibly convenient to reach major shopping malls, business hubs, and tourist attractions. The grand entrance sets the tone for the luxury that follows, and upon arrival, I was greeted warmly by the staff. The check-in process at the reception was smooth, and the team was both professional and attentive.

The room was immaculate, spacious, and tastefully decorated in a modern style. The bed was exceptionally comfortable, and all essential amenities such as high-speed Wi-Fi, a stocked minibar, and a beautiful city view were readily available. The bathroom was well-maintained, with premium toiletries, hot water, and a high standard of cleanliness.

The hotel also offers premium facilities including a swimming pool, a well-equipped gym, and a relaxing spa, all of which I thoroughly enjoyed. The in-house restaurant served a wide variety of dishes, with the breakfast buffet being an absolute highlight – offering a delicious and diverse spread to suit every palate.

What stood out the most was the attentive service. The staff consistently went above and beyond to ensure a comfortable and pleasant stay.

In short, Hyatt Regency is a perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and convenience, making it an excellent choice for both business travelers and families. I would highly recommend it to anyone visiting the city.

From the moment I stepped into JW Marriott Aerocity, I was greeted with warm hospitality and an unmistakable sense of luxury. The ambiance is elegant and modern, with every detail thoughtfully designed to create a world-class experience.

The rooms are spacious, impeccably clean, and offer every comfort one could ask for—plush bedding, high-end amenities, and stunning views of the city. Dining at their restaurants was a highlight—each meal was a culinary delight, especially at K3, which offers a fantastic range of global cuisines.

The staff deserves special mention—professional, courteous, and genuinely attentive to every guest’s need. Whether it was the concierge, housekeeping, or the front desk, everyone went above and beyond to make the stay seamless.

Its location in Aerocity is ideal—just minutes from the airport and close to major business hubs, yet peaceful and relaxing.

Highly recommended for business travelers, couples, or anyone looking to indulge in refined luxury with flawless service. I will absolutely be returning.

text.text:
A great 5 star property but it did not check all the boxes. The mattress in the room was very bad. It was a spring mattress in which I was completely sunken and woke up with a bad backache. Rest of the days, I had to sleep with a pillow under my back. Do not recommend it if you have back problems.
I tried their Spa and had the worse experience. I had booked an early morning massage before leaving but they failed to make a reservation, so on one was available. When I went, the guy at the desk decided to give me the massage. He had no knowledge of any pressure points and at one point he was only applying oil and doing nothing else. It was so bad that I decided to stop it at 40 mins into a 60 min massage.
Overall I had come to the city to run some errands, so the location was helpful. Staff and valet were very courteous and polite. Flower decoration in the lobby was specially wonderful. It was a sight for the sore eyes.

text.text:
The Connaught @ Delhi

Location:
This property is around 18Kms from the airport, very close to the Connaught place.

Parking:
Parking available within the property, as well as just outside.

Rooms:
I had stayed in their Deluxe category rooms, on the third floor overlooking the Shivaji Park Stadium.
The rooms are well aesthetically  maintained with all the facilities that a traveller can look forward to,
The bed linen, bath towels was good, Washrooms were also maintained well without any issue.
I had a very comfortable stay during my visit, absolutely no complaints.

Restaurant & Food:
They have a multi cuisine restaurant in the property, The breakfast was spread was good.

Check in / Check Out:
It was quick, they offered me the room on time.

Hotel Staff:
All the people in this property are soft spoken, friendly and we did not have any issues with any of them during our stay.

Pricing:
Moderately priced considering the facilities offered and the prime location.

My Verdict:
A highly recommended place, I would definitely come back here during my next visit to Delhi.

text.text:
Although this is a 4 star hotel, the service truly feels like 5 star and the price reflects that as well.

One month ago, we checked in at 4 am with no issues at all. The hotel staff gave us our very first impression of Indian hospitality, and it was a great one. Everyone — from security and doormen to receptionists and F&B staff — was kind, professional, and helpful throughout our stay.

We stayed in two different room types, and both were quiet, clean, and very comfortable. The food was above average, even when compared to some 5 star hotels.

The hotel is overall very clean, and the lobby smells fantastic! Curiously, it’s very quiet despite being in the heart of such a crowded city. The area felt safe, even though at first it didn’t look as safe it seemed — but we had no issues at all.

The location is also good — it’s within walking distance to the British area. Expect some random Indians start talking to you on the street.

Highly recommend this gem if you're looking for a luxurious yet comfortable stay in Delhi’s most iconic neighborhood!

text.text:
I expected my two night stay to be much more luxurious than it actually was for a 4* International chain . It was not worth the expense. Certainly not good value.

My room was a good size, spacious and quiet. The bed was super comfortable and clean linen appreciated.

However the shower room was dirty,  grouting or sealant around the corners on the floor , inside the shower room was worse like it hadn’t been cleaned throughly it looked grimey & not well maintained.
The cupboards looked old and didn’t align to close . The shower doors water stained not cleaned.

Some of the rooms were being renovated and the carpets in the corridor were left dirty with building materials and hotel guests had to walk through that because it wasn’t hoovered up even after the working day ended.

I was surprised to see that for breakfast there weren’t any fresh fruit juices available. Otherwise there was good a variety of breakfast options to choose from.

I did request for a breakfast takeaway as I had an early morning flight and the restaurant staff very kindly obliged and packed me some prantha’s. The front desk staff needed some convincing of this though even though I explained I had arranged it with the restaurant staff myself.

I enjoyed the food  in the restaurant Fifty9,  the staff at the hotel are overall helpful and polite. It’s a great location central to most restaurants and boutiques for shopping.
This is a safe place for a solo traveler.

text.text:
I booked The Roseate in Aerocity, New Delhi, expecting a flawless luxury experience for the ₹10,000 a night price tag. What I got was… complicated.

The first room I was given had a stale, shut-in smell — like it had been locked for days. The chair’s fabric was torn, room service was slow, and worst of all, the door lock literally came loose in my hand (picture attached). For a hotel of this standard, that’s not just an inconvenience, it’s a security concern.

To their credit, the team responded by upgrading me to a gorgeous, much larger room — Bose 2.1 speakers, premium touches, the works. In that moment, I could see the luxury I was expecting all along.

But here’s my dilemma: should I have had to go through that first experience at all? When you pay premium rates, you expect every room to meet that standard from the start.

I didn’t try the restaurants on-site, so I can’t comment on the dining, and maybe that’s what could have completely won me over. For now, I’m left undecided — part of me wants to return, part of me wonders if first impressions are too important to ignore.

editorialSummary.text: Chic hotel offering a restaurant & a shopping mall, plus a wellness spa with an outdoor pool.

text.text: The hotel is not in a very exclusive environment and it is strange that anyone other than hotel guests can enter, as it is also a mall. The business room is well equipped, but the cleanliness and housekeeping leave something to be desired. The staff at the reception is very nice and helpful, the same cannot be said about the waiters in the restaurant, who practically treat the guests as guests. They do not offer drinks and are not helpful. We would have liked to have a glass of wine with dinner, but we did not have the opportunity to do so. The hotel also offers conference facilities and it is very frustrating that almost exclusively men who are thought to be dressed walk around the hotel, take pictures of each other and occupy the elevators at almost all hours of the day, reacting aggressively if the elevator does not go where they want. The confectionery operating in the hotel is refreshing, they serve very delicious cookies here. Dinner and breakfast are well-stocked, although it would be expected in a 5-star international hotel chain not to feature exclusively Indian cuisine...

Imagine walking into a palace that embodies the essence of Indian royalty, with its intricate architecture, lush gardens, and serene ambiance. The Leela Palace in Delhi is a haven of luxury, where every detail is meticulously crafted to provide an unforgettable experience.
As you step into the hotel, you're greeted by the warm glow of golden lighting and the soft strains of traditional Indian music. The lavish decor, inspired by the rich heritage of Indian palaces, transports you to a bygone era of grandeur and opulence.

The hotel's spacious rooms and suites are designed to provide the ultimate comfort, with plush furnishings, marble bathrooms, and stunning views of the surrounding gardens. The Leela Palace is also renowned for its exceptional dining experiences, with a range of restaurants serving exquisite Indian, international, and fusion cuisine.

Whether you're looking to relax in style, indulge in fine dining, or explore the city's attractions, The Leela Palace in Delhi is the perfect retreat for those seeking a luxurious and memorable experience.

text.text:
Luxury Oasis in New Delhi

The Oberoi Hotel in New Delhi is an exceptional retreat that effortlessly blends opulence, impeccable service, and an ideal location in the bustling city. From the moment I stepped foot into the hotel, I was greeted with warm smiles and a level of hospitality that surpassed my expectations.

The rooms at The Oberoi Hotel are nothing short of magnificent. Elegantly designed and furnished, they exude sophistication and comfort. The plush bedding, spacious bathrooms, and stunning views of the city create an ambiance of serenity that is truly rejuvenating. The attention to detail in every aspect of the room, from the tasteful decor to the state-of-the-art amenities, was truly remarkable.

The culinary experiences at The Oberoi Hotel are a gastronomic delight. The hotel boasts a diverse range of restaurants, each offering its own unique ambiance and cuisine. Whether it was the authentic Indian delicacies at the renowned Amaranta or the delectable international fare at Threesixty°, every meal was a memorable experience. The attentive staff, guided by their expert sommeliers, ensured that every dining experience was a symphony of flavors.

text.text:
The Taj Palace in New Delhi is a world-class hotel that truly lives up to its reputation. From the moment you step into the lobby, you are greeted by a sense of luxury and sophistication. The staff is warm and welcoming, and always ready to assist with any needs or questions.

The rooms are spacious and elegantly decorated, with all the amenities one would expect from a five-star hotel. The beds are incredibly comfortable, ensuring a great night's sleep after a busy day exploring the city.

One of the highlights of staying at the Taj Palace is the incredible food. The hotel has several restaurants offering a range of cuisine, from traditional Indian dishes to international cuisine. The breakfast buffet is a particular standout, with a vast selection of delicious options to choose from.

The hotel also has a beautiful pool and spa, perfect for relaxing after a day of sightseeing. The gym is well-equipped and has a great range of cardio and weight equipment.

Overall, the Taj Palace is an excellent choice for anyone visiting New Delhi. The combination of luxurious accommodations, impeccable service, and outstanding food makes for an unforgettable stay.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at The Lodhi in New Delhi, and I have to say that it was one of the best hotel experiences I've ever had.

The hotel itself is stunning, with beautiful architecture and modern amenities that made my stay extremely comfortable. The rooms are spacious and well-appointed, with comfortable beds and plenty of natural light. I also appreciated the thoughtful touches like fresh flowers and fruit baskets that were provided.

The staff at The Lodhi were exceptional in every way. From the moment I arrived, I was greeted warmly and made to feel right at home. Everyone I encountered during my stay was friendly, professional, and eager to make sure that I had everything I needed to enjoy my time in New Delhi.

One of the highlights of my stay was the food. The hotel has several excellent restaurants, each serving delicious cuisine that showcases the best of Indian and international flavors. I particularly enjoyed the rooftop restaurant, which offered stunning views of the city along with fantastic food and cocktails.

Overall, I can't recommend The Lodhi enough. Whether you're traveling for business or pleasure, this hotel is an excellent choice for anyone visiting New Delhi. The combination of luxurious accommodations, exceptional service, and delicious food makes it a true standout among the city's many hotels.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at the ITC Maurya Hotel in Delhi, and I must say, it was an absolutely exceptional experience from start to finish. This hotel truly deserves every one of its five stars and more. Allow me to share my delightful experience.

From the moment I stepped into the grand lobby, I was greeted by the friendly and attentive staff who made me feel like a VIP. The check-in process was smooth and efficient, and I was immediately impressed by the luxurious and elegant ambiance of the hotel.

The rooms at ITC Maurya are simply stunning. Spacious, beautifully decorated, and equipped with modern amenities, they provided a comfortable and relaxing sanctuary after a long day of exploring the city. The attention to detail in the room design was impeccable, and the plush bedding ensured a restful night's sleep.

One of the highlights of my stay was the incredible dining options available at the hotel. The restaurants showcased a diverse range of cuisines, each offering an exceptional culinary experience. Whether it was the authentic Indian delicacies at Bukhara or the delectable international fare at Pavilion, every meal was a gastronomic delight. The attentive service and impeccable presentation added an extra touch of elegance to my dining experience.

The hotel's facilities were equally impressive. The fitness center was well-equipped, allowing me to maintain my workout routine even while traveling. The spa was a haven of tranquility, offering a wide range of rejuvenating treatments. The outdoor pool area provided a refreshing oasis in the heart of the bustling city, and the meticulously maintained gardens added a touch of serenity to the surroundings.

What truly sets ITC Maurya apart is its exceptional service. The staff members consistently went above and beyond to ensure my stay was memorable. From the doormen to the housekeeping staff, everyone was friendly, professional, and dedicated to making my experience unforgettable. I was truly impressed by the level of personalized attention I received throughout my stay.

The hotel's location is another advantage. Situated in the diplomatic enclave of Delhi, it offers convenient access to major attractions, shopping areas, and business districts. Whether I wanted to explore historical landmarks or indulge in retail therapy, everything was within easy reach.

In conclusion, ITC Maurya Hotel Delhi surpassed my expectations in every way. The impeccable service, luxurious accommodations, outstanding dining options, and convenient location all contributed to an unforgettable five-star experience. I wholeheartedly recommend this hotel to anyone looking for a truly exceptional stay in Delhi. I can't wait to return for another memorable visit!

text.text:
My Honest Review
During my recent stay at the hotel, one of the standout aspects that truly elevated the entire experience was the exceptional hospitality and professionalism of the hotel staff. From the moment I arrived, I was greeted with warm smiles and a genuine sense of welcome that instantly made me feel at home.
The front desk team was incredibly efficient and courteous, ensuring a smooth check-in process and readily answering all my questions with patience and clarity. They went above and beyond to accommodate my requests, whether it was about room preferences, local recommendations, or general inquiries.
The housekeeping staff deserves special appreciation as well. The room was consistently cleaned and maintained to a high standard. Every detail, from fresh linens to replenished amenities, was taken care of with care and consistency. Their quiet, respectful service added to the comfort of the stay.
I was also impressed by the restaurant and room service team, who were prompt, friendly, and attentive. They remembered preferences, offered helpful suggestions, and delivered everything with a smile. It's the kind of thoughtful service that truly enhances the overall guest experience.
What stood out the most was the genuine warmth and eagerness to help displayed by everyone — not just out of obligation, but seemingly because they truly cared about the guests' comfort and satisfaction. It’s rare to find such consistently positive and professional service across the board.
Overall, the staff played a major role in making my stay memorable. Their friendliness, attention to detail, and commitment to guest satisfaction were exemplary. I would gladly return to this hotel and recommend it to others based largely on the outstanding service provided by the team.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Shangri La Eros New Delhi, and I must say it exceeded all my expectations. From the moment I entered the elegant lobby to the time of my departure, the hotel provided an exceptional experience that left a lasting impression.

First and foremost, the staff at Shangri La Eros New Delhi deserves high praise. They were warm, attentive, and went above and beyond to ensure my stay was comfortable. From the friendly greetings at the reception to the prompt room service, every interaction was met with a genuine smile and a willingness to assist.

Speaking of the rooms, they were nothing short of luxurious. My accommodation boasted elegant decor, comfortable furnishings, and a stunning view of the city. The attention to detail was evident in the thoughtful amenities and the impeccable cleanliness maintained throughout my stay.

One aspect that truly stood out was the culinary experience. The hotel offered a variety of dining options, each showcasing the finest flavors from around the world. Whether it was the sumptuous Indian cuisine or the delectable international dishes, every meal was a delightful journey for the taste buds. The attentive and knowledgeable staff made the dining experience even more enjoyable.

Furthermore, the location of Shangri La Eros New Delhi is perfect for both business and leisure travelers. Situated in the heart of the city, it provided easy access to popular attractions, shopping centers, and corporate hubs. The convenience and accessibility added tremendous value to my stay.

Lastly, the hotel's facilities were top-notch. The fitness center was well-equipped, allowing me to maintain my workout routine, and the spa offered a blissful retreat where I could indulge in relaxation and rejuvenation.

In conclusion, my experience at Shangri La Eros New Delhi was nothing short of exceptional. The attentive staff, luxurious accommodations, delightful dining options, and convenient location combined to create an unforgettable stay. I wholeheartedly recommend this hotel to anyone seeking a memorable and truly enjoyable experience in New Delhi.

text.text:
From the moment you step into the Shangri La Luxury Hotel, you are transported into a world of elegance and exceptional service. Every detail, from the grandiose lobby with its marble floors and crystal chandeliers to the meticulously appointed rooms, exudes sophistication and luxury.

The rooms themselves are nothing short of spectacular. Spacious, with panoramic views of the city skyline or tranquil beachfront, they feature plush furnishings, soft, high-thread-count linens, and state-of-the-art technology to ensure a stay that's both comfortable and seamless. The bathrooms are equally indulgent, with deep soaking tubs, rain showers, and premium bath amenities.

Service at the Shangri La is truly unparalleled. The staff is attentive yet unobtrusive, always ready to accommodate any request with a smile. Whether arranging a private tour, securing reservations at the hotel’s Michelin-starred restaurant, or organizing a relaxing spa treatment, no request is too small or too extravagant.

Speaking of the spa, it’s a must-visit. Offering a range of holistic treatments, the spa’s serene ambiance and highly skilled therapists ensure a truly rejuvenating experience. The hotel’s multiple dining options also stand out—each restaurant offers a unique culinary experience, from fresh seafood to gourmet international cuisine, prepared with the finest ingredients.

The hotel’s amenities, including the infinity pool overlooking the ocean, a fully equipped fitness center, and a curated selection of luxury boutiques, provide guests with everything they could possibly need, all within the confines of the property.

Whether you're here for business or leisure, the Shangri La Luxury Hotel exceeds expectations in every way. It’s a haven of comfort, luxury, and impeccable service—a place where guests can relax, recharge, and experience the highest level of hospitality. Highly recommended for those seeking a top-tier, five-star experience.

My recent visit to Andaz Aerocity was for an exciting launch event for Lay’s new world flavours, and the experience was truly exceptional, exceeding all expectations. From the moment I stepped into the hotel, I was enveloped in an atmosphere of sophisticated warmth and impeccable hospitality.
The event itself was flawlessly executed. The organizers did a phenomenal job, creating a vibrant and engaging atmosphere. The flow was seamless, and the array of refreshments was outstanding. We were treated to a delightful spread of snacks, delectable sweets, freshly brewed coffee, refreshing water, and a variety of cold drinks. The generous hamper at the end was a wonderful touch, a testament to the thoughtful planning that went into the event.
Beyond the event's success, the Andaz Aerocity's hospitality shone brightly. The staff were attentive, courteous, and genuinely welcoming, making every guest feel valued. The hotel's stylish and contemporary design created a chic backdrop for the event, and the comfortable ambiance made it easy to relax and enjoy the experience. The attention to detail, from the elegant décor to the seamless service, was remarkable.
Andaz Aerocity proved to be the perfect venue for such a high-profile launch, showcasing its ability to host events with both flair and efficiency. The combination of the event organizers' excellent planning and Andaz's exceptional hospitality made for an unforgettable experience. I would highly recommend Andaz Aerocity for both events and stays, as it delivers a truly premium and memorable experience

text.text:
Reunion Bliss in the Lap of Luxury

I recently had the privilege of experiencing our class reunion at the exquisite Presidential Suite of The Leela Ambience Convention Hotel, Delhi. The combination of luxurious amenities, impeccable service, and delectable delights ensured that our reunion was nothing short of extraordinary. However, what truly set this experience apart was the exceptional service we received. From arranging a seamless check-in process to accommodating our special requests, they went above and beyond to make us feel like royalty.

The Presidential Suite was a masterpiece of design, seamlessly blending modern sophistication with a welcoming ambiance. The tasteful decor and plush furnishings exuded comfort and elegance, setting the perfect stage for our heartwarming reunion. The spacious living area provided the ideal backdrop for our gathering, allowing us to reconnect and reminisce in utmost comfort.

A very special thanks to Bhaskar, our butler, a true embodiment of professionalism and warmth. From greeting us with a genuine smile to tending to every request with utmost efficiency, his presence was instrumental in making us feel pampered and cared for. The attention to detail and anticipation of our needs truly made us feel like VIPs throughout our stay.

In conclusion, my reunion experience at the hotel was nothing short of exceptional. From the lavishly appointed interiors to the impeccable service, every aspect of this stay was carefully orchestrated to create a truly unforgettable experience. If you're seeking a venue that combines luxury, comfort, and the perfect ambiance for a special gathering, look no further than this place.

text.text:
**Luxurious Comfort and Impeccable Hospitality: A Review of Hyatt Regency Hotel, Delhi

Nestled in the heart of India's bustling capital, Hyatt Regency Hotel stands as a beacon of luxury and refinement amidst the urban landscape of Delhi. Boasting world-class amenities, impeccable service, and a strategic location, this five-star establishment offers discerning travelers an unforgettable stay that epitomizes elegance and comfort.

**Exquisite Accommodations:**
From opulent suites to tastefully appointed guest rooms, Hyatt Regency Hotel presents a range of accommodation options designed to cater to the diverse needs of its guests. Each room exudes contemporary elegance, featuring plush furnishings, modern amenities, and panoramic views of the city skyline or lush greenery. Whether seeking a relaxing retreat or a productive workspace, guests are greeted with a haven of comfort and tranquility in every corner.

**Gourmet Dining Experience:**
The hotel's culinary offerings are a culinary delight, showcasing a diverse array of flavors from around the globe. Indulge in a gastronomic journey at its signature restaurants, where master chefs craft exquisite dishes using the finest ingredients. From authentic Indian cuisine at 'The China Kitchen' to delectable international fare at 'Café', every dining experience is a celebration of taste and refinement.

**World-Class Facilities:**
Hyatt Regency Hotel leaves no stone unturned when it comes to providing guests with an unparalleled experience. State-of-the-art facilities such as a fully equipped fitness center, rejuvenating spa, and sparkling swimming pool cater to the wellness and leisure needs of discerning travelers. Additionally, the hotel's versatile event spaces and comprehensive business amenities make it an ideal choice for corporate gatherings, conferences, and social events of all scales.

**Exceptional Service:**
What truly sets Hyatt Regency Hotel apart is its commitment to personalized service and hospitality excellence. From the moment guests step foot into the lobby, they are greeted with warm smiles and attentive assistance from the dedicated staff. Whether it's arranging transportation, organizing bespoke experiences, or fulfilling special requests, the team goes above and beyond to ensure every guest's stay is nothing short of extraordinary.

**Strategic Location:**
Situated in the diplomatic enclave of Delhi, Hyatt Regency Hotel enjoys a prime location that offers convenient access to the city's major attractions, business districts, and transportation hubs. Whether exploring historical landmarks such as Humayun's Tomb and India Gate or conducting business in the bustling commercial districts, guests find themselves perfectly positioned to navigate the city with ease.

In conclusion, Hyatt Regency Hotel in Delhi sets the standard for luxury hospitality, combining unparalleled comfort, exquisite dining, and exceptional service to create a truly memorable experience for every guest. Whether visiting for business or leisure, this prestigious establishment embodies the epitome of refined elegance and sophistication, making it the preferred choice for discerning travelers seeking a sanctuary of luxury in the heart of India's capital.

text.text:
As a frequent traveler to Delhi for both business and leisure, I recently had the pleasure of staying at the Hyatt Regency Delhi, and I must say, it consistently delivers an exceptional experience.
From the moment you step into the grand lobby, you're greeted with an ambiance of sophistication and warmth. Check-in was incredibly smooth and efficient, with the staff being remarkably welcoming and professional. Their hospitality truly sets the tone for the entire stay.
My room was spacious, impeccably clean, and offered all the comforts one could wish for. The bed was incredibly comfortable, ensuring a restful night's sleep, and the modern amenities, including a well-appointed bathroom, made my stay very convenient.
One of the major highlights of the Hyatt Regency Delhi is undoubtedly its dining options. I particularly enjoyed the breakfast spread, which was a lavish affair with a fantastic variety of Indian and international cuisines – something for everyone! The in-house restaurants like The China Kitchen and La Piazza also lived up to their reputation for exquisite food and excellent service.
The hotel's location is another huge plus. Situated in Bhikaji Cama Place, it's perfectly positioned for easy access to business hubs, major attractions, and the airport. Whether I needed to attend meetings or explore the city, getting around was never an issue.
The facilities, including the pool and fitness center, were well-maintained and provided a great way to unwind after a busy day. What truly stands out, however, is the staff. Every interaction, from the front desk to housekeeping to the restaurant teams, was marked by genuine politeness, attentiveness, and a willingness to assist. They really go the extra mile to make guests feel valued.
While it is a premium hotel, the overall experience, the quality of service, and the luxurious setting make it well worth the price. I would highly recommend the Hyatt Regency Delhi to anyone looking for a top-tier stay in the capital. I'm already looking forward to my next visit!

text.text:
Nestled in the bustling neighborhood of Aerocity, New Delhi, the JW Marriott Hotel Aerocity stands as a beacon of sophistication and opulence. As an avid traveler, I recently had the pleasure of staying at this renowned establishment and was thoroughly impressed by the unmatched level of luxury and service it offered.

From the moment I stepped into the grand lobby, I was greeted with warm smiles and impeccable hospitality. The check-in process was swift and efficient, ensuring that I felt welcomed and at ease after a long journey. The attention to detail was evident throughout the property, with its tasteful decor, contemporary architecture, and plush furnishings exuding a sense of elegance.

My room was an oasis of comfort, featuring modern amenities that catered to every need. The well-appointed suite boasted stunning views of the city skyline, and the spacious bathroom equipped with luxurious toiletries added a touch of indulgence to my stay. The hotel's commitment to cleanliness and hygiene was also noticeable, providing an extra layer of assurance during these uncertain times.

One of the standout aspects of the JW Marriott Hotel Aerocity was its culinary delights. With a plethora of dining options, from fine-dining restaurants to casual cafes, each meal was a gastronomic adventure. The diverse cuisines on offer catered to various palates, and the quality of ingredients and presentation were exemplary.

The hotel's facilities were equally impressive. The state-of-the-art fitness center, complete with modern equipment and experienced trainers, allowed me to maintain my exercise routine effortlessly. Additionally, the rooftop pool offered a serene escape, where I could unwind and enjoy the breathtaking views of the city below.

The attentive and professional staff elevated my experience to unparalleled heights. Every request was met with a sense of urgency and a genuine desire to ensure my comfort and satisfaction. The concierge was particularly helpful in arranging sightseeing tours and offering valuable local recommendations.

The JW Marriott Hotel Aerocity's prime location was yet another advantage. Its proximity to the international airport made it an ideal choice for both business and leisure travelers. Furthermore, its accessibility to various city landmarks and cultural attractions allowed me to explore Delhi with ease.

In conclusion, my stay at the JW Marriott Hotel Aerocity was nothing short of extraordinary. The seamless blend of luxury, comfort, and hospitality left a lasting impression on me. Whether you are a discerning traveler or seeking a lavish retreat in the heart of Delhi, this hotel is undoubtedly the epitome of refined elegance and a true testament to the Marriott brand's commitment to excellence. I highly recommend the JW Marriott Hotel Aerocity and eagerly anticipate my next visit to this haven of indulgence.

text.text:
Exceptional Hospitality and a Breathtaking View!

Our recent visit to JW Marriott was truly memorable. We went to meet my parents and brother at the hotel, and to our surprise, their room was upgraded to an executive room. The hotel staff was incredibly professional, ensuring a smooth and pleasant experience throughout.

A special mention to the room service staff, who went above and beyond by offering my three-year-old daughter a bowl full of chocolates—such a thoughtful and heartwarming gesture that made our day!

The room itself was spacious, with a well-maintained and luxurious bathroom featuring a bathtub and premium toiletries. Cleanliness and comfort were top-notch. We spent half a day with our family and cherished every moment of it.

The highlight of our stay was the breathtaking view from the room. As soon as we opened the curtains, we were greeted with a stunning sight of airplanes standing in the hangars—an absolute delight for aviation enthusiasts!

Overall, JW Marriott exceeded our expectations with its excellent service, comfortable accommodations, and mesmerizing views. We highly recommend this hotel for a luxurious and unforgettable experience

text.text:
Roseate Hotels and Resorts is a collection of luxury hotels consisting of seven niche hotels across India and the United Kingdom with more under development. The name ‘Roseate’ comes from a bird with pink hued plumage. Avant-garde, imaginative and contemporary in design, each Roseate hotel has a story to tell. Key focus is laid on immaculate hospitality and service, strategic location, bespoke design and architecture, aesthetics, exemplary dining and meticulous attention to detail.

In India the existing portfolio includes The Roseate New Delhi, Roseate House New Delhi and The Roseate Ganges Rishikesh. In the United Kingdom, it includes Roseate House London, The Roseate Reading, The Roseate Villa Bath and The Roseate Edinburgh. Roseate Hotels & Resorts is a brand of Bird Hospitality, Bird Group, India.

text.text: I had the pleasure of staying at Roseate House during a recent business trip with my family and I must say, it exceeded all of our expectations. The hotel boasts a beautiful decor and huge, luxurious rooms. The swimming pool was an added bonus and provided the perfect spot to relax after a long day. The food was delicious and made for a great dining experience. Overall, it was a fantastic stay and I highly recommend Roseate House to anyone looking for a 5-star hotel experience❤️❤️❤️

I had an amazing time visiting this mall! The food was absolutely delicious – every bite was tasty and satisfying. The hotel experience was fantastic, with top-notch service and a wow factor that left me impressed. The parking space is convenient and spacious, making it easy to get around.

Inside the mall, there's a great mix of stores, including Decathlon, Zudio, and Allen Solly, so you're spoiled for choice when it comes to shopping. The atmosphere overall is vibrant and welcoming, making it a pleasure to spend time here. I was truly satisfied with everything, from the food to the shopping experience. Highly recommended!

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Radisson Blu Hotel, New Delhi Dwarka, and I must say that it was an experience that exceeded my expectations in many ways. This hotel is a perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and convenience, and I am thrilled to share my detailed review.

Location and Accessibility

One of the most significant advantages of staying at Radisson Blu is its location in Dwarka, one of the most well-connected areas of New Delhi. The hotel is just a short drive away from the Indira Gandhi International Airport, making it an ideal choice for both business and leisure travelers. Additionally, it is well-connected to other parts of the city via the Dwarka Metro Station, making it easy to explore the capital. Whether you’re here for a business meeting or a family vacation, the location is incredibly convenient.

First Impressions and Ambiance

As soon as I walked into the Radisson Blu, I was immediately struck by the grand entrance and the modern yet elegant décor. The lobby exudes luxury, with high ceilings, contemporary furniture, and tasteful artwork. The staff at the reception desk were incredibly welcoming and efficient, making check-in a breeze. The overall ambiance of the hotel is calm and soothing, offering a peaceful retreat from the hustle and bustle of New Delhi.

Room Quality and Comfort

I stayed in one of the Deluxe Rooms, and I was very impressed with the space and comfort it offered. The room was spacious, immaculately clean, and well-equipped with all the amenities you could ask for. The king-sized bed was incredibly comfortable, and I had no trouble getting a good night’s sleep. The room had a modern design, with sleek furniture, a large flat-screen TV, and a minibar stocked with a selection of beverages and snacks. The bathroom was equally impressive, with a rain shower, luxurious toiletries, and soft, fluffy towels. The attention to detail in the room’s design and cleanliness was top-notch, making it feel like a home away from home.

Service Excellence

What truly set Radisson Blu apart was the exceptional service. The staff were consistently polite, professional, and eager to assist with anything I needed. From the concierge team helping me with local recommendations to the room service staff bringing up food promptly and with a smile, every interaction I had with the hotel staff was positive. Special mention to Rahul Yadav and Neeraj Pandey, who went above and beyond to ensure my stay was comfortable. The service here truly elevates the overall experience, making it feel personalized and exclusive.

Dining Experience

The hotel offers a variety of dining options, and I had the pleasure of experiencing both. The buffet breakfast at the all-day dining restaurant was fantastic, with a wide range of dishes catering to both continental and Indian tastes. There was something for everyone – from freshly baked croissants and cereals to dosas, parathas, and traditional Indian curries. The quality and taste of the food were outstanding, and the staff were attentive, ensuring that everything was well-stocked.

I also dined at the hotel’s specialty restaurants, where I had a chance to try some Indian delicacies. The food was rich in flavor, with generous portions. The chefs here do a fantastic job of preparing food that reflects the true essence of Indian cuisine. The service was prompt, and the wait staff were always attentive without being intrusive.

Facilities and Amenities

The hotel offers a wide range of facilities that make it suitable for both business and leisure guests. The gym is well-equipped, and the spa provides a relaxing escape after a long day of sightseeing or work. There is also a large outdoor pool, perfect for unwinding in the evening. The business center is well-appointed, and the hotel offers meeting rooms and event spaces for corporate gatherings, making it a great option for business travelers.

text.text:
The hotel's ambiance is nothing short of enchanting. The lobby exudes elegance and sophistication, and the attention to detail in the decor is truly remarkable. The staff, dressed in immaculate uniforms, greeted me with warm smiles and a level of service that was second to none.
My room was a haven of comfort and opulence. The plush bedding, tasteful furnishings, and state-of-the-art amenities made me feel like I was in a dream. The stunning view from my window added to the charm.
Dining at the hotel's restaurants was a culinary delight. The variety of cuisines on offer catered to every palate, and the quality of the food was exceptional. Whether it was the sumptuous breakfast buffet or the gourmet dinner, each meal was a memorable experience.
The hotel's spa and wellness facilities were a sanctuary of relaxation. I indulged in a rejuvenating spa treatment that left me feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. The fitness center was well-equipped, and the pool area was a serene escape.
What truly sets this hotel apart, though, is its exceptional staff. Every member of the team went above and beyond to ensure my stay was flawless. Their professionalism, courtesy, and willingness to assist with any request were truly commendable.
I can confidently say that this 5-star hotel has set the bar incredibly high for luxury accommodations. If you're looking for an unforgettable experience where every detail is meticulously crafted, look no further. I wholeheartedly recommend this hotel to anyone seeking a world-class stay. I cannot wait to return and experience its magic once again.
Thank you to the entire team for making my stay truly extraordinary!

text.text: That one night stay here gave me a very happy stay.  A mall is located on the lowest floor.  It is also full of shops.  It includes bars and game areas for children to play.  Products from world class brands like decathlon are also available here.Judy's outlet is here.  The luxuries of the rooms here are very nicely arranged.  The view from the window is very beautiful.  There are two metro stations nearby.  Access to the airport is very easy.  There are rickshaw and auto rickshaw facilities right outside the hotel.  All in all it's a hotel I like very much. Thank you Radisson Team…
